Laptops.name: MacBook Pro
Laptops.description: The 14-inch MacBook Pro blasts forward with M3 Pro and M3 Max, radically advanced chips that drive even greater performance for more demanding workflows. With industry-leading battery life—up to 18 hours—and a beautiful Liquid Retina XDR display, it’s a pro laptop without equal. Now in a new color: Space Black.

Laptops.name: Surface Pro 4
Laptops.description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 4 is a 2-in-1 hybrid tablet and laptop, designed for both productivity and portability. Released in 2015, it was part of Microsoft's Surface lineup, aimed at professionals and students who need the flexibility of a tablet combined with the functionality of a full laptop
